metadata.title: CVE-2009-2687

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP 10 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP 10 SP3

metadata.description: The exif_read_data function in the Exif module in PHP before 5.2.10 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a malformed JPEG image with invalid offset fields, a different issue than CVE-2005-3353.
